source.text: Page 1: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is the simulation of human intelligence in machines.

target.text: AI systems are designed to perform tasks such as recognizing speech, learning, and

source.text: Page 2: One of the major areas of AI is Natural Language Processing (NLP).

target.text: NLP allows machines to understand and generate human language.

source.text: Page 3: Ethical concerns about AI are increasingly important.

target.text: Researchers advocate for responsible development of AI technologies.
